DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : - To demonstrate risedronate 35-mg weekly efficacious placebo increase maintain bone mineral density ( BMD ) lumbar spine 1 year treatment woman non-osteoporotic 0.5-5 year postmenopausal . Secondary objective : - To demonstrate risedronate 35-mg weekly efficacious placebo increase maintain total proximal femur , femoral neck , trochanter BMD 1 year treatment woman 0.5-5 year postmenopausal - To assess general safety 35-mg risedronate administer weekly .
DOC.criteria: The following information clinical trial provide information purpose allow patient physician initial discussion trial . This information intend complete information trial , contain consideration may relevant potential participation trial , replace advice personal physician health professional . Main Inclusion/Exclusion criterion list hereafter : Inclusion criterion : Be postmenopausal 0.55 years.Menopause define 12 month without menses , base medical history . Subjects postmenopausal secondary bilateral oophorectomy must serum FSH > 40 mIU/mL estradiol < 20 pg/mL . Subjects 3 contiguous lumbar spine vertebral body ( L1L4 ) without fracture degenerative disease . Lumbar spine BMD mean value > 0.772g/cm2 ( Hologic ) > 0.880 g/cm2 ( Lunar ) . Exclusion criterion : Subjects adequate lumbar spine BMD osteoporotic total proximal femur BMD ( < 0.637 g/cm2 [ Hologic ] ) < 0.694 g/cm2 [ Lunar ] ) determine dualenergy xray absorptiometry ( DXA )
